Posts.Content: granny92 wrote: I had Stage 1 Invasive Carcinoma, diagnosed in May. 2013. I received 33 Radiation treatments which were completed July 26, 2013. I have just had a PET Scan which revealed 1.6 cm scar-like tissue in left breast,with faint FDG uptake. My oncologist is not concerned, but I am. Shouldn't I be healed? I have tenderness as well. The reason for the PET Scan was "moderate tenderness to palpation, small tissue mass along 5th rib. He has diagnosed this a neuroma since it showed no uptake. I feel there should be no uptake at all, 2 years after radiation was completed. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Healing after radiation granny92 Moderators
